### Electricity network

- x=-42.5, y=39.5
- x=-22.5, y=23.5
- x=17.5, y=-2.5
- x=3.5, y=2.5
- x=7.5, y=2.5

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Make sure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it.
### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource you want to harvest.
### Errors when connecting entities
- Make sure the entities you are trying to connect are compatible and have available connection points.
- Ensure that the entities are not too far apart to be connected.
### Errors when using pipes and fluid systems
- Make sure the pipes are properly connected to the fluid system and that the fluid system is not empty.
### Errors when working with steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine is connected to a power network and has a fluid input.
- Make sure the steam engine is fueled and has a proper fluid output.
